document.forum_title: Latest Press Releases News on One News Page
document.discussion_title: Fund Statistics Now Available for: Dreyfus High Yield Strategies Fund, Dreyfus Municipal Income, Inc., Dreyfus Strategic Municipal Bond Fund, Inc., Dreyfus Municipal Bond Infrastructure Fund, Inc., and Dreyfus Strategic Municipals, Inc.
document.topic_text: Fund Statistics Now Available for: Dreyfus High Yield Strategies Fund, Dreyfus Municipal Income, Inc., Dreyfus Strategic Municipal Bond Fund, Inc., Dreyfus Municipal Bond Infrastructure Fund, Inc., and Dreyfus Strategic Municipals, Inc. Monday, 25 April 2016 ( 43 minutes ago ) NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Dreyfus High Yield Strategies Fund (NYSE: DHF), Dreyfus Municipal Income, Inc. (NYSE: DMF), Dreyfus Strategic Municipal Bond Fund, Inc. (NYSE: DSM), Dreyfus Municipal Bond Infrastructure Fund, Inc. (NYSE: DMB) and Dreyfus Strategic Municipals, Inc. (NYSE: LEO) each announced that certain fund statistics, as of April 25, 2016, are now available. The information will be posted to www.dreyfus.com and can be accessed at: https://public.dreyfus.com/products-performance/clo
